pr_title: Load Modded Datapacks in DatapackScreen, before world creation

timeline.message:
load forge datapack

removed duplicate creation of dye tags
init forge tags on bootstrap
Updated the mcmeta files
Modify the default datapack check to incorporate mods

timeline.bodyText: This does absolutely nothing. Congrats you run the static tantalizer of the outer class. It doesn't do anything to the inner classes.
timeline.author: LexManos
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -34,6 +35,8 @@
 
 public class Tags
 {
+    public static void init () {}; //Dummy init, create the tags so that they are added to their collections.

timeline.bodyText: I mean, is there a reason for this change? Ya I guess it's a little bit of cleanup making only one instance referenced multiple places. But that doesn't matter. The game will update both just fine.
timeline.author: LexManos
